# Skrell
Skrell are a species of amphibious, anura/cephalopod-like humanoids known for their distinctive appearance and advanced technology. They have a unique physiology that allows them to thrive in aquatic environments and possess a natural resistance to cold and heat. *NOTE: Skrell are conidered adults at 120 years of age and can live up to 500 years.*
## Racial Features
- Receive [color=#ffa500]20% more brute and 15% more slashing damage[/color] while receiving [color=#1e90ff]20% less cold and heat damage[/color]. - Due to the wide range of aquatic worlds Skrell reside on, they can handle extreme temperatures. - Skrellian bodies secrete a special mucus to keep their skin moist, granting them resistance to heat damage. - Have an increased need for water, becoming dehydrated twice as fast as other species. - Instead of teeth, Skrell have hardened gums, making consumption of foods that require chewing difficult and painful. - Skrell are a naturally psionic species and possess innate telepathic abilities. They can form pockets of communal dreamscapes where Skrell can consciously interact in their sleep. (Not implemented) - Possess limited facial muscles, relying on head-tail movements, vocalization, and various other body movements to express themselves. - Are a single-gender species, though they may present as masculine or feminine to better blend in with other species.
